name: Endless Nightmare (Kamolchanok)
description:
Endless running game that will make you feel like going back to school once again.  Feel the academic pressure, confront the strict teacher and survive from the endless nightmare of stress and anxiety. This game can run on mobile phone, PC, and WebGL (you can also play WebGL version on your phone) Play on WebGL in fullscreen.

"V" a new student in a faculty, facing the strict teacher and feeling the overload academic pressure for the first time make him get anxiety attack, to the point that he has a nightmare about surviving in this faculty.

In this game, you need to keep running, avoid the obstacles such as F, W, and alcohol, collect the "A+" as much as you can and let's see the final results.

The game concept The gameplay will be on an endless road in V's nightmare. It'll provide an illusive atmosphere but still maintain the joyful and arcade feeling. High score record is also added just for challenging and the gameplay can be gradually harder and faster as the time passes. Which grade rank will you get?

The final result will show you 10 different grade ranks (or endings) that will show how V's life goes if he got each grade. Can you collect them all?

How to play

(There's also a tutorial in the game)

For PC version

A - D or Left - Right arrow key to move left and right

Space to jump

For Mobile version

Move the left controller to move the character left and right

Tab the right controller to jump


For WebGL version

Just like the PC and Mobile version

Please help us by rating this game. Tell us what you think! Our team :
